                 <div class="althotelsDiv2 use_sprites_no_back featured_reviewer">
                  <p class="trackit althotelsReview2 fixed_review_height fixed_review_top_align review_content" data-url="/hotel/de/forum.html;rurl=#hash-blockdisplay4" lang="en">
                   <span>
                    Good location - short walk to town 
 4 person room was actually two rooms with adjoining door which meant we had 2 bathrooms and lots of space
                   </span>
                  </p>
                  <p class="trackit altHotelsReviewer2 " style="font-size: 94%;">
                   <span class="fixed_review_user">
                    Rachel,
                    <span class="reviewer_country">
                     <span class="reviewer_country_flag sflag slang-gb ">
                     </span>
                     United Kingdom
                    </span>
                    <br/>
                   </span>
                  </p>
                  <div class="icon_user_back_container">
                   <div class="icon_user_back_inverted_border">
                   </div>
                   <svg class="bk-icon -sprite-icon_profile_avatar bui__icon__reviewer" height="18" viewbox="0 0 22 22" width="18">
                    <path d="M11 0C4.9 0 0 4.9 0 11s4.9 11 11 11 11-4.9 11-11S17.1 0 11 0m0 19.9c-3 0-5.8-1.6-7.3-3.9.2-.5.7-1 1.6-1.5 2.1-.9 4.4-.9 4.3-2.4 0 0-.5-.4-.7-1.8 0 0-.1 0-.2-.3-.2-.3-.7-1.4-.1-1.4 0 0-1.3-3.6 2.4-3.9 3.8.2 2.4 3.9 2.4 3.9.6 0 .1 1.2 0 1.5-.1.3-.2.3-.2.3-.2 1.4-.7 1.8-.7 1.8-.1 1.5 2.2 1.5 4.3 2.4.9.4 1.4.9 1.6 1.5-1.6 2.2-4.4 3.8-7.4 3.8" fill="#CAD4E6">
                    </path>
                   </svg>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="althotelsDiv2 use_sprites_no_back featured_reviewer">
                  <p class="trackit althotelsReview2 fixed_review_height fixed_review_top_align review_content" data-url="/hotel/de/forum.html;rurl=#hash-blockdisplay4" lang="en">
                   <span>
                    The room very clean also bed very comfortable and the roof terrace was nice
                   </span>

           <div data-et-view="YQecbaTaTaBOLNYQQSNHRUUO:3">
           </div>

          <span class="gallery-side-reviews-wrapper__pixel" data-js-uhgsr-stages="2,4">
          </span>
          <div class="hp_hotel_description_hightlights_wrapper ">
           <div class="hotel_description_wrapper_exp hp-description">
            <div class="hp_desc_main_content ">
             <div class="" data-et-click="customGoal:BUeeZdbaBOdUfTXNVO:2 customGoal:BUeePYUQdLPSKPGeeUZC:2" data-et-mouseenter="customGoal:BUeeZdbaBOdUfTXNVO:1 customGoal:BUeePYUQdLPSKPGeeUZC:1" id="summary">
              <div class="chain-content ">
              </div>
              <p>
              </p>
              <div data-et-view="OTfdASFTHPGMYfFAVVMNSDdSCRAcNZRO:1">
              </div>
              <span class="hp-description--property-name-best-seller yellowfy_bestseller dtri">
               <i aria-hidden="true" class="bicon-acstar">
               </i>
               One of our best sellers in Hameln!
              </span>
              A 5-minute walk from Hameln’s old town, this peaceful hotel offers Wi-Fi. Hamlin Train Station is a 10-minute walk away.
              <p>
               All rooms at the Hotel Garni Forum are comfortably furnished with a private bathroom, cable TV and a fan. An elevator offers guests access to the property's rooftop terrace.
              </p>
              <p>
               Every customer receives a complimentary bottle of water and guests can store their bicycles on-site. Bicycle hire is also available at the property. Guests may charge electric bicycles free of charge.
              </p>
              <p>
               A breakfast buffet is served each morning, featuring fresh local products.
              </p>
              <p>
               The scenic Hämelschenburg Castle and Bückeberg hill are just a 25-minute drive away. The city of Hannover and its trade fair exhibition centers can be reached in less than an hour by car or public transport from the Hotel Garni Forum.
               <br/>
              </p>
             </div>
             <p class="hp-desc-review-highlight hp-desc-traveller-type--ph-v0">
              Couples in particular like the location – they rated it
              <strong>
               8.0
              </strong>
              for a two-person trip.
             </p>
             <p class="hp-desc-we-speak">
              We speak your language!
             </p>
             <p class="summary hotel_meta_style">
              <span class="hp-desc-highlighted">
               Hotel Garni Forum has been welcoming Booking.com guests since Nov 10, 2010
               <br/>
              </span>
             </p>

            <div class="hp_desc_important_facilities clearfix ">
             <h3 class="hp-description-sub-header" data-et-view="">
              Most Popular Facilities
              <div data-et-view="BdTeLNJCRAOTVDFHBUBMRAOAcEUC:1">
              </div>
             </h3>
             <div class="important_facility " data-name-en="Free Parking">
              <svg class="bk-icon -iconset-parking_sign hp__important_facility_icon" height="20" viewbox="0 0 128 128" width="20">
               <path d="M70.8 44H58v16h12.8a8 8 0 0 0 0-16z">
               </path>
               <path d="M108 8H20A12 12 0 0 0 8 20v88a12 12 0 0 0 12 12h88a12 12 0 0 0 12-12V20a12 12 0 0 0-12-12zM70 76H58v24H42V28h28a24 24 0 0 1 0 48z">
               </path>
              </svg>
              Free Parking
             </div>
             <div class="important_facility " data-name-en="Pets allowed">
              <svg class="bk-icon -iconset-pawprint hp__important_facility_icon" height="20" viewbox="0 0 128 128" width="20">
               <path d="M61 34c0 9.9-6.3 18-14 18s-14-8.1-14-18 6.3-18 14-18 14 8.1 14 18zm20-18c-7.7 0-14 8.1-14 18s6.3 18 14 18 14-8.1 14-18-6.3-18-14-18zM16.5 47.4c-6.9 2.1-10.3 11-7.6 20S19.4 82.1 26.3 80c6.9-2.1 10.3-11 7.6-20S23.4 45.4 16.5 47.4zM94.2 60c-2.7 9 .7 18 7.6 20 6.9 2.1 14.6-3.6 17.3-12.5s-.7-18-7.6-20C104.6 45.4 96.9 51 94.2 60zM64 104c11.9 0 6.1 8 22 8 4.9-.2 10.9-5.3 11-16 .1-13.8-12.4-34-33-35-20.6 1-33.1 21.2-33 35 .1 10.7 6.1 15.8 11 16 15.9 0 10.1-8 22-8z">
               </path>
              </svg>
              Pet Friendly

          <script>
           ;(function() {
 'use strict';
 if(document && document.addEventListener && document.querySelectorAll) {
 var BUTTON_SELECTOR = '.book_now_button_handler';
 var reserveButtons = document.querySelectorAll(BUTTON_SELECTOR);
 reserveButtons = Array.prototype.slice.call(reserveButtons);
 if(reserveButtons && reserveButtons.length) {
 reserveButtons.forEach(function(button) {
 button.addEventListener('click', goToAvailabilityBlock);
 });
 document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
 reserveButtons.forEach(function(button) {
 button.removeEventListener('click', goToAvailabilityBlock);
 });
 });
 }
 }
 function goToAvailabilityBlock() {
 if(window.history && window.history.replaceState) {
 var uri = window.location.toString();
 if (uri.indexOf("#") > 0) {
 var uriWithoutHash = uri.substring(0, uri.indexOf("#"));
 window.history.replaceState({}, document.title, uriWithoutHash);
 }
 }
 var RT_SELECTOR = '.hp-section-header';
 var roomsTable = document.querySelector(RT_SELECTOR);
 if(roomsTable) {
 window.scrollTo(0, roomsTable.offsetTop);
 }
 }
 })();
          </script>

                <li class="feedback-loop__list-item">
                 <label class="feedback-loop__checkbox">
                  <input autocomplete="off" class="feedback-loop__checkbox-field" data-model="multiple_choice_answers[]" type="checkbox" value="61"/>
                  <span class="feedback-loop__checkbox-caption">
                   Cancellation policies
                  </span>
                 </label>
                </li>
                <li class="feedback-loop__list-item">
                 <label class="feedback-loop__checkbox">
                  <input autocomplete="off" class="feedback-loop__checkbox-field" data-model="multiple_choice_answers[]" type="checkbox" value="62"/>
                  <span class="feedback-loop__checkbox-caption">
                   Couples policies (are unmarried individuals allowed?)
                  </span>
                 </label>

                <li class="feedback-loop__list-item">

                   Check-in/check-out times
                  </span>
                 </label>
                </li>
               </ul>
              </div>
              <div class="feedback-loop__group">
               <p class="feedback-loop__group-header">
                <label class="feedback-loop__checkbox">

                 </span>

              </span>

        <div class="pagination_scroll_top" data-tab="reviews" id="blockdisplay4">
         <div aria-hidden="true" class="sliding-panel-widget " data-component="core/sliding-panel-core-a11y" data-id="hp-reviews-sliding" id="hp-reviews-sliding" tabindex="-1">
          <div class="sliding-panel-widget-scrollable " data-component="core/et-scroll-observer" data-scrollable="">
           <div aria-label="Close" class="sliding-panel-widget-close-button" data-close-button="" role="button" tabindex="0">
            <i aria-hidden="true" class="bicon-aclose">
            </i>
           </div>
           <div class="sliding-panel-widget-content review_list_block one_col" data-content="">
            <div>
            </div>
            <div class=" review-policy reviews-new-title--fix-top clearfix review-policy-fix ">
             <i class="review-policy__icon">
              눱
             </i>
             <div class="review-policy__header-group">
              <h2 class="review-policy__header">
               100% Verified Reviews
              </h2>
              <h3 class="review-policy__subheader">
               Real guests. Real stays. Real opinions.
               <a class="review-policy__open" data-component="core/lightbox/trigger" href="#guidelines_content">
                Read more
               </a>
              </h3>
             </div>
             <style>
              .guidelines_content {
 background: #fff;
 padding: 12px 24px;
 text-align: justify;
 color: #003580;
 }
 .guidelines_content_lightbox {
 background: #fff;
 padding: 12px 24px;
 text-align: justify;
 height: 400px;
 overflow-y: scroll;
 color: #003580;
 }
 .guidelines_content p,
 .guidelines_content_lightbox p {
 margin: 1em 0;
 }
 .guidelines_content .head,
 .guidelines_content_lightbox .head {
 font-weight: bold;
 font-size: 16px;
 }
 @media (max-device-width: 600px) {
 .guidelines_content {
 width: auto;
 text-align: left;
 }
 }
 .lang_is_rtl .guidelines_content{
 direction: rtl;
 text-align: right;
 }
             </style>
             <div class="guidelines_content_lightbox" id="guidelines_content" style="display:none;">
              <p class="headline">
               Booking.com Guest Review Guidelines
              </p>
              <i>
               To keep the rating score and review content relevant for your upcoming trip, we archive reviews older than 24 months.
              </i>
              <p>
               Only a customer who has booked through Booking.com and stayed at the property in question can write a review. This allows us to verify that our reviews come from real guests like you. Who better to tell others about the free breakfast, friendly staff, or their comfortable room than someone who’s stayed at the property?
              </p>
              <p>
               We want you to share your story, with both the good and the not-so-good. All we ask is that you follow a few simple guidelines.
              </p>
              <p class="head">
               <strong>
                Reviews Vision
               </strong>
              </p>
              <p>
               We believe review contributions and property responses will highlight a wide range of opinions and experiences, which is critical in helping guests make informed decisions about where to stay.
              </p>
              <p class="head">
               <strong>
                Reviews Principles
               </strong>
              </p>
              <p>
               Contributions to Booking.com are a reflection of the dedication of our guests and properties, so we treat them with the utmost respect.
              </p>
              <p>
               Whether negative or positive, we'll post every comment in full, as quickly as possible, after it's moderated to comply with Booking.com guidelines. We'll also provide transparency over the status of submitted content.
              </p>
              <p>
               After a review has been submitted, you can modify it by contacting Booking.com customer service.
              </p>
              <p>
               We'll use the same guidelines and standards for all user-generated content, and for the property responses to that content.
              </p>
              <p>
               We'll allow the contributions to speak for themselves, and we won’t be the judge of reality. Booking.com’s role is to be a feedback distributor for both guests and properties.
              </p>
              <p class="head">
               <strong>
                Guidelines and Standards for Reviews
               </strong>
              </p>
              <p>
               These guidelines and standards aim to keep the content on Booking.com relevant and family-friendly, without limiting expression or strong opinions. They're also applicable regardless of the comment's tone.
              </p>
              <p>
               <strong>
                Contributions should be travel related.
               </strong>
               The most helpful contributions are detailed and help others make better decisions. Please don’t include personal, political, ethical, or religious commentary. Promotional content will be removed and issues concerning Booking.com’s services should be routed to our Customer Service or Accommodation Service teams.
              </p>
              <p>
               <strong>
                Contributions should be appropriate for a global audience.
               </strong>
               Please avoid using profanity or attempts to approximate profanity with creative spelling, in any language. Comments and media that include hate speech, discriminatory remarks, threats, sexually explicit remarks, violence, or the promotion of illegal activity are not permitted.
              </p>
              <p>
               <strong>
                All content should be genuine and unique to the guest.
               </strong>
               Reviews are most valuable when they are original and unbiased. Your contribution should be yours. Booking.com property partners should not post on behalf of guests or offer incentives in exchange for reviews. Attempts to bring down the rating of a competitor by submitting a negative review will not be tolerated.
              </p>
              <p>
               <strong>
                Respect the privacy of others.
               </strong>
               Booking.com will make an effort to obscure email addresses, telephone numbers, website addresses, social media accounts, and other similar details.
              </p>
              <p>
               <strong>
                The opinions expressed in contributions are those of Booking.com customers and properties, and not of Booking.com. Booking.com does not accept responsibility or liability for any reviews or responses. Booking.com is a distributor (without any obligation to verify) and not a publisher of these comments and responses.
               </strong>
              </p>
              <p>
               By default, reviews are sorted based on the date of the review and on additional criteria to display the most relevant reviews, including but not limited to: your language, reviews with text, and non-anonymous reviews. Additional sorting options might be available (by type of traveler, by score, etc...).
              </p>
             </div>
            </div>

             <i class="review_item_icon">
              눉
             </i>
             I left the hotel early after booking for 2 nights, the condition was so bad I only stayed 1 night.
            </p>
            <p class="review_pos ">
             <i class="review_item_icon">
              눇
             </i>
             The staff was friendly.
            </p>
            <p class="review_staydate ">
             Stayed in June 2018
            </p>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </li>
        <li class="review_item clearfix ">
         <p class="review_item_date">
          Reviewed: June 1, 2018
         </p>
         <div data-et-view="aRDPNZJKSXe:2">
         </div>
         <div class="review_item_reviewer">
          <div>

          <h4>
           Leesa_Michael

          <span class="reviewer_country">

          </span>

           3 helpful votes
          </div>
         </div>

         <div class="review_item_review">
          <div class="review_item_review_container lang_ltr recent_property_reviews_item">
           <div class="review_item_review_header">

             <span class=" review-score-widget review-score-widget__exceptional review-score-widget__score-only review-score-widget__no-subtext jq_tooltip high_score_tooltip ">

               9.6

    // <![CDATA[
 booking.env.you_can_book_at_most_x_rooms_with_this_hotel = 'You can book at most 0 rooms with this hotel';

   <script>
    var B = booking = window.booking || {};
 var booking_extra = {

   <script>
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator && navigator.serviceWorker.getRegistrations) {
 navigator.serviceWorker.getRegistrations().then(function(registrations) {
 registrations.forEach(function(registration) {
 registration.unregister();
 });
 });

   <script type="text/javascript">
    booking.ensureNamespaceExists('env');
 booking.env.b_google_deleted = 1;
   </script>
   <script>
    (function(){
 (function() {(function(root,factory){"use strict";if(typeof define==="function"&&define.amd){define("et",factory)}else{root.et=factory()}})(this,function(){"use strict";var debug={level:0};var Trackables={experiment:"e",stage:"s",goal:"g",customGoal:"cg",goalWithValue:"gwv"};var TrackedOnClient=[];var requestInfo=function(){var index={};var el;var store="";function write(){var oldStore=store;store=Object.keys(index).join(",");if(el||(el=document.getElementById("req_info"))){if(el.innerHTML!==oldStore){updateIndex(el.innerHTML);store=Object.keys(index).join(",")}el.innerHTML=store}}function updateIndex(rawString){index=rawString.split(",").reduce(function(index,element){index[element]=true;return index},index)}function populate(item){index[item]=true}function api(obj){populate(obj);if(typeof obj==="string"){populate(obj);write()}else if(obj instanceof Array){obj.forEach(populate);write()}}return{populate:api}}();var url;var SENDING_DELAY=0;var FAIL_DELAY=100;var FAIL_ATTEMPTS=10;var sendBeacon=function(){var isSendingBeacon=false;var timeout;var payload=[];var currentlySending=[];var failCounter=0;function stringifyPayload(payload){var exps=[];var goals=[];var customGoals=[];var goalsWithValues=[];var stages=[];for(var tmp,i=0,l=payload.length;i<l;++i){tmp=payload[i];switch(tmp.what){case Trackables.experiment:exps.push(tmp.hash);break;case Trackables.stage:stages.push(tmp.hash+"|"+tmp.id);break;case Trackables.goal:goals.push(tmp.hash);break;case Trackables.customGoal:customGoals.push(tmp.hash+"|"+tmp.id);break;case Trackables.goalWithValue:var gwvStringified=gwvReport(tmp.hash);if(gwvStringified){goalsWithValues.push(gwvStringified)}break;default:debug.level&&debug.report(debug.events.UNABLE_TO_STRINGIFY,tmp)}}return"ete="+exps.join(",")+"&etg="+goals.join(",")+"&etcg="+customGoals.join(",")+"&ets="+stages.join(",")+"&etgwv="+goalsWithValues.join(",")}function ajax(options){var url=options.url;var callback=options.complete||function(){};var headers=options.headers||{};var header;var XHR_DONE_STATE=XMLHttpRequest.DONE||4;var httpRequest=new XMLHttpRequest;if(!url){return false}httpRequest.open("GET",url,true);if(headers){for(header in headers){if(headers.hasOwnProperty(header)){httpRequest.setRequestHeader(header,typeof headers[header]==="function"?headers[header].call():headers[header])}}}httpRequest.onreadystatechange=function onStateChange(){if(httpRequest.readyState===XHR_DONE_STATE){callback(httpRequest,httpRequest.status)}};httpRequest.send()}function onRequestSucceeded(){debug.level&&debug.report(debug.events.BEACON_SENT,payload);isSendingBeacon=false;failCounter=0;timeout=null;if(payload.length){sendRequest()}}function onRequestFailed(){failCounter++;isSendingBeacon=false;timeout=null;if(failCounter>=FAIL_ATTEMPTS){currentlySending=[]}else{payload=payload.concat(currentlySending);currentlySending=[];timeout=window.setTimeout(sendRequest,failCounter*FAIL_DELAY)}}function sendRequest(){debug.level&&debug.report(debug.events.SEND_BEACON,payload.slice(0));isSendingBeacon=true;currentlySending=payload;var requestUrl=url+"&"+stringifyPayload(currentlySending);if(jset.m){requestUrl+="&m="+encodeURIComponent(jset.m)}payload=[];try{ajax({url:requestUrl,complete:function(xhr,status){if(status===200){onRequestSucceeded()}else{onRequestFailed()}},headers:ajaxHeaders})}catch(e){var img=new Image;img.onload=onRequestSucceeded;img.onerror=onRequestFailed;img.src=url}}function send(what,hash,id){debug.level&&debug.report(debug.events.INIT_BEACON,what,hash,id);if(arguments.length===0){}payload.push({what:what,hash:hash,id:id});if(isSendingBeacon||timeout){debug.level&&debug.report(debug.events.DEFER_BEACON,payload)}else{timeout=window.setTimeout(sendRequest,SENDING_DELAY)}}return send}();var fnvCache={};var onViewHandlerDebounceTime=300;var onViewHandlerDelayed=false;var wasTracked={};var toBeTrackedOnView=[];var onViewHandlerAttached=false;var onViewHandlerRunning=false;var useFNV=false;var shouldNotTrack=false;var ajaxHeaders={};var bindCustomOnView=false;var unbindCustomOnView=false;var mergeCopyAndEtJs=false;var replaceSliceWithFor=false;var copyTrackingInitiated=false;var isDevServer=false;var jset={r:{},t:{},f:{}};if(!jset.r){jset.r={}}if(!jset.f){jset.f={}}if(!jset.t){jset.t={}}var gwvCache={};var GWV_VALUES_LIMIT_PER_PAGEVIEW=50;function gwvRegister(name,value){if(!gwvCache[name]){gwvCache[name]=[[],[]]}var newValues=gwvCache[name][0];var oldValues=gwvCache[name][1];if(oldValues.length<=GWV_VALUES_LIMIT_PER_PAGEVIEW+10){newValues.push(value);return true}}function gwvReport(name){if(!gwvCache[name]||!gwvCache[name][0].length){return}var newValues=gwvCache[name][0];var oldValues=gwvCache[name][1];var result=[name,newValues.join(":")];if(oldValues.length){result.push(oldValues.join(":"))}[].push.apply(oldValues,newValues.splice(0,newValues.length));return result.join("|")}function trackingIndexKey(what,hash,id){var res;if(what===Trackables.experiment||what===Trackables.goal){res=[what,hash]}else{res=[what,hash,id]}return res.join("-")}function fnvHash(hash){if(!useFNV){return hash}if(fnvCache[hash]){return fnvCache[hash]}var offset=2166136261;for(var index=0,length=hash.length;index<length;++index){offset+=(offset<<1)+(offset<<4)+(offset<<7)+(offset<<8)+(offset<<24);offset^=hash.charCodeAt(index)}return fnvCache[hash]=(offset>>>0).toString(16)}function genericTrack(what,hash,id){debug.level&&debug.report(debug.events.TRACKING_ATTEMPT,{what:what,hash:hash,id:id,variant:(what===Trackables.experiment||what===Trackables.stage)&&_variant(hash)});if(shouldTrack(what,hash,id)){switch(what){case Trackables.experiment:setTracked(Trackables.experiment,hash);requestInfo.populate(hash);if(jset.m){TrackedOnClient.push(hash)}sendBeacon(Trackables.experiment,hash);break;case Trackables.stage:setTracked(Trackables.stage,hash,id);requestInfo.populate(hash+"|"+id);if(jset.m){TrackedOnClient.push(hash+"|"+id)}sendBeacon(Trackables.stage,hash,id);break;case Trackables.goal:setTracked(Trackables.goal,hash);sendBeacon(Trackables.goal,hash);break;case Trackables.customGoal:setTracked(Trackables.customGoal,hash,id);sendBeacon(Trackables.customGoal,hash,id);break;case Trackables.goalWithValue:if(gwvRegister(hash,id)){sendBeacon(Trackables.goalWithValue,hash,id)}break;default:debug.level&&debug.report(debug.events.TRACK_UNKNOWN_ITEM,what,hash,id)}}if(what===Trackables.experiment){return _variant(hash)}else{return true}}function setTracked(what,hash,id){wasTracked[trackingIndexKey(what,hash,id)]=true}function shouldTrack(what,hash,id){if(shouldNotTrack){return false}debug.level&&debug.report(debug.events.SHOULD_TRACK,what,hash,id);var config={what:what,hash:hash,id:id,variant:(what===Trackables.experiment||what===Trackables.stage)&&_variant(hash)};var encodedHash;var bitNumber;if(wasTracked[trackingIndexKey(what,hash,id)]){debug.level&&debug.report(debug.events.NOT_TRACKING_WAS_TRACKED,config);return false}else{if(what===Trackables.experiment||what===Trackables.stage){bitNumber=1<<(id||0);encodedHash=fnvHash(hash);if(jset.f[encodedHash]){debug.level&&debug.report(debug.events.NOT_TRACKING_FULLON,config);return false}else if(jset.r[encodedHash]===undefined){debug.level&&debug.report(debug.events.NOT_TRACKING_NOT_RUNNING,config);return false}else if(jset.t[encodedHash]&bitNumber){setTracked(what,hash,id);debug.level&&debug.report(debug.events.NOT_TRACKING_WAS_TRACKED,config);return false}}else if(what===Trackables.customGoal){encodedHash=fnvHash(hash);if(jset.f[encodedHash]){debug.level&&debug.report(debug.events.NOT_TRACKING_FULLON,config);return false}else if(jset.r[encodedHash]===undefined){debug.level&&debug.report(debug.events.NOT_TRACKING_NOT_RUNNING,config);return false}}}return true}function setEventHandlers(eventName,elem,what,hash,id){debug.level&&debug.report(debug.events.ADD_EVENT_LISTENER,eventName,elem,what,hash,id);var elements=selectElements(elem);if(elements.length>0){if(eventName==="view"){trackOnView(elements[0],what,hash,id)}else{for(var i=0,l=elements.length;i<l;i++){addEvent(elements[i],eventName,fn)}}}else{debug.level&&debug.report(debug.events.NOT_EXISTING_ELEMENT_WONT_ADD_LISTENER,what,hash,id)}function fn(){genericTrack(what,hash,id);for(var i=0,l=elements.length;i<l;i++){removeEvent(elements[i],eventName,fn)}}}function onViewHandlerWindowLoad(){window.setTimeout(onViewHandler,onViewHandlerDebounceTime)}function trackOnView(element,what,hash,id){debug.level&&debug.report(debug.events.ADD_DEBOUNCED_VIEW_HANDLER,element,what,hash,id);var key=trackingIndexKey(what,hash,id);if(wasTracked[key]){return false}toBeTrackedOnView.push([element,what,hash,id]);if(!onViewHandlerAttached){debug.level&&debug.report(debug.events.ATTACH_VIEW_LISTENER,toBeTrackedOnView);addEvent(window,"scroll",onViewHandler);addEvent(window,"resize",onViewHandler);addEvent(window,"load",onViewHandlerWindowLoad);window.setTimeout(onViewHandler,onViewHandlerDebounceTime);if(bindCustomOnView){bindCustomOnView(onViewHandler)}onViewHandlerAttached=true}}function onViewHandler(){if(onViewHandlerRunning){if(!onViewHandlerDelayed){onViewHandlerDelayed=setTimeout(function(){onViewHandlerDelayed=false;onViewHandler()},onViewHandlerDebounceTime)}else{return}}onViewHandlerRunning=true;var tmp=[];debug.level&&debug.report(debug.events.CHECK_IF_VISIBLE,toBeTrackedOnView);var currentExp;for(var i=0,l=toBeTrackedOnView.length;i<l;++i){currentExp=toBeTrackedOnView[i];if(currentExp&&isVisible(currentExp[0])){debug.level&&debug.report(debug.events.ONVIEW_TRACKING_TRIGGERED,currentExp[1],currentExp[2],currentExp[3]);genericTrack(currentExp[1],currentExp[2],currentExp[3])}else{tmp.push(currentExp)}}toBeTrackedOnView=tmp;debug.level&&debug.report(debug.events.VISIBLE_CHECK_FINISHED,toBeTrackedOnView);if(toBeTrackedOnView.length===0){onViewHandlerAttached=false;removeEvent(window,"scroll",onViewHandler);removeEvent(window,"resize",onViewHandler);removeEvent(window,"load",onViewHandlerWindowLoad);if(unbindCustomOnView){unbindCustomOnView(onViewHandler)}debug.level&&debug.report(debug.events.DETACH_VIEW_LISTENER)}window.setTimeout(function(){onViewHandlerRunning=false},onViewHandlerDebounceTime)}function isVisible(element){var bounds;var clientViewPortHeight;var clientViewPortWidth;if(!element){return false}if(!element.parentElement){return false}if(!element.getBoundingClientRect){return true}bounds=element.getBoundingClientRect();clientViewPortHeight=window.innerHeight||document.documentElement.clientHeight;clientViewPortWidth=window.innerWidth||document.documentElement.clientWidth;if(bounds.right<0||bounds.left>clientViewPortWidth||bounds.top===0&&bounds.left===0&&bounds.right===0&&bounds.bottom===0){return false}return bounds.top<clientViewPortHeight}function selectElements(elem){if(typeof elem==="string"){return replaceSliceWithFor?toArray(document.querySelectorAll(elem)):[].slice.call(document.querySelectorAll(elem))}else if(elem instanceof HTMLCollection){return replaceSliceWithFor?toArray(elem):[].slice.call(elem)}else if(elem instanceof NodeList){return replaceSliceWithFor?toArray(elem):[].slice.call(elem)}else if(elem instanceof Element){return[elem]}else if(Object.prototype.toString.call(elem)==="[object Array]"){return elem}else if(window.jQuery&&elem instanceof jQuery){return elem.toArray()}return[]}function addEvent(obj,type,fn){if(obj.attachEvent){obj["e"+type+fn]=fn;obj[type+fn]=function(){obj["e"+type+fn](window.event)};obj.attachEvent("on"+type,obj[type+fn])}else{obj.addEventListener(type,fn,false)}}function removeEvent(obj,type,fn){if(obj.detachEvent){if(obj[type+fn]){obj.detachEvent("on"+type,obj[type+fn]);obj[type+fn]=null}}else{obj.removeEventListener(type,fn,false)}}function generateEventTracker(eventName,elem,what){return function(hash,id){if(shouldTrack(what,hash,id)){setEventHandlers(eventName,elem,what,hash,id)}else{debug.level&&debug.report(debug.events.WONT_ATTACH_EVENT_TRACKING,eventName,elem,what,hash,id)}}}function on(eventName,elem){return{track:generateEventTracker(eventName,elem,Trackables.experiment),stage:generateEventTracker(eventName,elem,Trackables.stage),goal:generateEventTracker(eventName,elem,Trackables.goal),customGoal:generateEventTracker(eventName,elem,Trackables.customGoal)}}function extend(dest,src){for(var p in src)if(src.hasOwnProperty(p)){dest[p]=src[p]}}function set(newJset){jset.f=newJset.f||{};extend(jset.r,newJset.r||{});extend(jset.t,newJset.t||{});if(newJset.m&&!jset.m){jset.m=newJset.m;TrackedOnClient=[]}}function _variant(rawHash){var hash=fnvHash(rawHash);return jset.r[hash]||jset.f[hash]||0}function track(hash){if(arguments.length>1){throw"Track only accept one parameter"}if(!hash){if(isDevServer){throw"B.et.track: hash value should be a non-empty string"}return 0}return genericTrack(Trackables.experiment,hash)}function trackStage(hash,num){if(!hash){if(isDevServer){throw"B.et.trackStage: hash value should be a non-empty string"}return false}if(num===undefined){if(isDevServer){throw"B.et.trackStage: stage number should be a number between 1 and 9"}return false}if(num===0){return track(hash)}if(!/^[1-9]$/.test(num)){if(isDevServer){throw"B.et.trackStage: stage number should be a number between 1 and 9"}return false}return genericTrack(Trackables.stage,hash,num)}function goal(name){if(!name){if(isDevServer){throw"B.et.goal: name should be a non-empty string"}return false}return genericTrack(Trackables.goal,name)}function customGoal(hash,num){if(!hash||!num||!/^[1-5]$/.test(num)){if(isDevServer){if(!hash){throw"B.et.customGoal: hash value should be a non-empty string"}else if(!num||!/^[1-5]$/.test(num)){throw"B.et.customGoal: custom goal number should be a number between 1 and 5"}}return false}return genericTrack(Trackables.customGoal,hash,num)}function goalWithValue(name,value){if(!/^js_/.test(name)||!/^-?[0-9]+$/.test(value)){if(isDevServer){if(!/^js_/.test(name)){throw"B.et.goalWithValue: name should be a non-empty string with prefix js_"}else if(!/^-?[0-9]+$/.test(value)){throw"B.et.goalWithValue: value should be an integer"}}return false}return genericTrack(Trackables.goalWithValue,name,value)}function initAttributesTracking(root){var i,event,attr,events=["change","click","mouseenter","touch","focus","view"];addDataAttributesTracking();function addDataAttributesTracking(){if(!root||root.length===0){root=document}else if(root.length){root=root[0]}if(root&&root.querySelectorAll){for(i=0;i<events.length;i++){event=events[i];attr="data-et-"+event;var elements=root.querySelectorAll("["+attr+"]");for(var j=0;j<elements.length;j++){var elem=elements[j];var exps=parseAttribute(elem.getAttribute(attr));var onEvent=event==="touch"?"touchstart":event;var onObj=on(onEvent,elem);exps.forEach(function(item){if(onObj&&onObj[item.action]){onObj[item.action](item.hash,item.value)}})}}}}if(mergeCopyAndEtJs&&!copyTrackingInitiated){copyTrackingInitiated=true;copyExperimentTracking.init()}}function parseAttribute(attrs){var attrRe=/^(?:(goal|customGoal):)?([a-zA-Z]\w+)?(?::([\d]))?$/,i,exps=[];attrs=attrs.split(/\s+/);for(i=0;i<attrs.length;i++){var match=attrs[i].match(attrRe),hash=match&&match[2],value=match&&match[3],action=match&&match[1]||(value?"stage":"track");if(action){exps.push({hash:hash,value:value,action:action})}else{}}return exps}function configure(newConfig){if(newConfig.url){url=newConfig.url}if(newConfig.jset){set(newConfig.jset)}if(typeof newConfig.useFNV!=="undefined"){useFNV=newConfig.useFNV}if(typeof newConfig.ajaxHeaders!=="undefined"){ajaxHeaders=newConfig.ajaxHeaders}if(typeof newConfig.snt!=="undefined"){shouldNotTrack=newConfig.snt}if(typeof newConfig.bindOnView==="function"){bindCustomOnView=newConfig.bindOnView}if(typeof newConfig.unbindOnView==="function"){unbindCustomOnView=newConfig.unbindOnView}if(typeof newConfig.mergeCopyAndEtJs!=="undefined"){mergeCopyAndEtJs=newConfig.mergeCopyAndEtJs}if(typeof newConfig.replaceSliceWithFor!=="undefined"){replaceSliceWithFor=newConfig.replaceSliceWithFor}if(newConfig.isDevServer){isDevServer=true}}function getDebugConfiguration(debugConfig){if(debug.level!=0){return}var isLevelNumber=!isNaN(debugConfig.level),isEventsObject=typeof debugConfig.events=="object",isReportFunction=typeof debugConfig.report=="function";if(isLevelNumber&&isEventsObject&&isReportFunction){debug.level=debugConfig.level;debug.events=debugConfig.events;debug.report=debugConfig.report}}function getTrackedOnClient(){return TrackedOnClient.join(",")}function toArray(elements){var result=[],length=elements.length,index;for(index=0;index<length;index++){result.push(elements[index])}return result}var copyExperimentTracking=function(){var COPY_TIMER_INTERVAL=1e3;var COPY_SCAN_TIMER_INTERVAL=5e3;var deferredCopyExperiments=[];var mergeexphash="EIZTGSdDSOONWCPaddfHe";function subscribeForCopyExperimentOnView(init){var copyScripts=selectElements("script[data-hash='"+mergeexphash+"']");var scrollTop=getScrollTop();copyScripts.forEach(function(current){var hash=current.getAttribute("data-hash");var parentNode=current.parentNode;parentNode.removeChild(current);if(init&&isVisible(parentNode)){on("view",parentNode).stage(hash,1)}else{var elemBoundingRect=parentNode.getBoundingClientRect();deferredCopyExperiments.push({hash:hash,node:parentNode,offsetTop:elemBoundingRect.top+scrollTop})}})}function updateCopyExperimentOnViewTracking(){var clientViewPortHeight=window.innerHeight||document.documentElement.clientHeight;var scrollTop=getScrollTop();var foldOffset=scrollTop+clientViewPortHeight;deferredCopyExperiments=deferredCopyExperiments.filter(function(experiment,index){if(experiment.offsetTop<foldOffset){var elemBoundingRect=experiment.node.getBoundingClientRect();experiment.offsetTop=elemBoundingRect.top+scrollTop;if(isVisible(experiment.node)&&experiment.offsetTop<foldOffset){trackStage(experiment.hash,1);return false}}return true})}function getScrollTop(){return window.pageYOffset||document.documentElement.scrollTop||document.body.scrollTop||0}function init(){subscribeForCopyExperimentOnView(true);setInterval(function(){if(deferredCopyExperiments.length){updateCopyExperimentOnViewTracking()}},COPY_TIMER_INTERVAL);setInterval(subscribeForCopyExperimentOnView,COPY_SCAN_TIMER_INTERVAL)}return{subscribeForCopyExperimentOnView:subscribeForCopyExperimentOnView,updateCopyExperimentOnViewTracking:updateCopyExperimentOnViewTracking,init:init}}();function Et(){}Et.prototype.track=track;Et.prototype.stage=trackStage;Et.prototype.goal=goal;Et.prototype.customGoal=customGoal;Et.prototype.goalWithValue=goalWithValue;Et.prototype.on=on;Et.prototype.set=set;Et.prototype.Trackables=Trackables;Et.prototype.configure=configure;Et.prototype.initAttributesTracking=initAttributesTracking;Et.prototype.tracked=getTrackedOnClient;Et.prototype.registerDebug=getDebugConfiguration;return new Et});}());

 function blockdisplay(i) {
 var body = $( document.body );
 if (document.getElementById("blockdisplay" + i)) {
 for (var j = 1; j <= 4; j++) {
 if (document.getElementById('blockdisplay' + j)) {
 document.getElementById('blockdisplay' + j).style.display = (j === i) ? 'block' : 'none';
 }
 }
 body.trigger((i == 4) ? 'ReviewsTab_onOpen' : 'ReviewsTab_onClose')
 .trigger( 'RT:reset' );
 ( booking.eventEmitter || $( window ) )
 .trigger( 'BLOCKDISPLAY' + i + '.OPEN' );
 if (i === 1 && typeof bMovableBookNowButton != "undefined") {
 bMovableBookNowButton.init();
 }
 }
 }
 function popup( url, w, h ) {
 newWindow = window.open( url, 'popupWindow', 'width=' + w + ',height=' + h + ',menubar=no,toolbar=no,location=no,bookmarks=no,status=no,scrollbars=yes,resizable=yes' );
 if ( window.focus ) {
 newWindow.focus();
 }
 }

    ;(function nav_timing(w){ 'use strict'; function validMetric(value) { return !isNaN(value) && value >= 0 && value < 150000 || false; } function callback() { var performance = w.performance || w.mozPerformance || w.msPerformance || w.webkitPerformance || {}, navigation = performance.navigation, timing = performance.timing, hasGetEntries = !!performance.getEntriesByType, userTiming = []; if ( !domain || !connect || !response || !dom || !load || w._phantom || w.callPhantom || w.__phantomas || window.Buffer || window.emit || window.spawn ) { return false; } if (typeof RUMSpeedIndex === 'function') { var speedIndex = Math.round(RUMSpeedIndex()); if (speedIndex) { if (window.ga) { setTimeout(function(){ ga('send', 'timing', 'Performance', 'SpeedIndex', speedIndex, B.env['b_action']); }, 100); } userTiming.push('speedindex:' + speedIndex); } } if (hasGetEntries) { var utMetrics = performance.getEntriesByType('measure') || []; for ( var _tmp, _i = 0, _l = utMetrics.length; _i < _l; _i++ ) { _tmp = utMetrics[_i]; userTiming.push(_tmp['name'] + ':' + Math.round(_tmp['duration'])); } } var navTimesHost = '/navigation_times', navTimesQuery = 'sid=&pid=1201502e9c4703bc&nts=' + navigation.type + ',' + navigation.redirectCount + ',' + timing.navigationStart + ',' + timing.unloadEventStart + ',' + timing.unloadEventEnd + ',' + timing.redirectStart + ',' + timing.redirectEnd + ',' + timing.fetchStart + ',' + timing.domainLookupStart + ',' + timing.domainLookupEnd + ',' + timing.connectStart + ',' + timing.connectEnd + ',' + timing.secureConnectionStart + ',' + timing.requestStart + ',' + timing.responseStart + ',' + timing.responseEnd + ',' + timing.domLoading + ',' + timing.domInteractive + ',' + timing.domContentLoadedEventStart + ',' + timing.domContentLoadedEventEnd + ',' + timing.domComplete + ',' + timing.loadEventStart + ',' + timing.loadEventEnd + ',0' + '&first=1' + '&cdn=ec' + '&dc=4' + '&bo=3' + '&lang=en-us' + '&ref_action=hotel' + '&aid=304142' + '&stype=1' + '&route=' + '&ua=110' + '&ch=d' + '&lt=' ; var navTimesBody = 'utiming=' + userTiming.join(','); var _req = new XMLHttpRequest(); _req.open('POST', navTimesHost + '?' + navTimesQuery); _req.setRequestHeader('Content-Type','application/x-www-form-urlencoded');  function onUsabillaClick(event){
 B.lightbox.hide();
 if (event) {
 $(event.target).closest('.user_center_popover').hide()
 event.preventDefault();
 }
 if (!window.usabilla_live) {
 preloadUsabilla();
 }

 window.usabilla_live('data', { custom: { action: "hotel"} });
 window.usabilla_live('click');
 }

 $('.provide_website_feedback').click(onUsabillaClick);
 }

 if (options.id === 'uc_feedbacklink_box') {
 preloadUsabilla();
 }
 });
